text: Karnus au Bellona is a Gold of the Martian House Bellona and the eldest son of Tiberius and Julia.
name: Karnus

text: Karnus is forceful, sadistic, and adheres to the Gold social culture that holds strength, achievement, and martial prowess above all else. He looked down on his siblings, especially Julian, whom he found unworthy of the family name and of their mother's love. When Cassius brought a bird he had wounded with a slingshot to him, he dropped a rock on it.
name: Karnus

text: Mentioned to resemble an Obsidian in all but colour. He towers over typical Golds, with shoulders twice as broad as Darrow's.
name: Karnus

text: Extremely strong, breaking the back of a Luneborn over his knee.fellow Bellona re Additionally, he is a skilled commander of troops, even besting Darrow in battle, a feat few can claim.
name: Karnus

text: Karnus is present at Eagle Rest when his parents' mines are visited by a Logos of House Augustus on August 8th, 725 PCE to inform them of an increase in helium-3 production quotas. When his parents protest the ArchGovernor's demands, Karnus inserts himself into the conversation. The Logos retells the story of Nero's rise to power and his subsequent murder of Karnus's aunt Iona. Karnus attempts to strike at the Logos, but is held back by his mother. When the Augustus lancers accompanying the Logos remind Karnus of the fate of House Cylus, Karnus declares that he will find each of the lancers after his graduation from the Institute in two years and make them tell him the story again, and that he will bring grapes.
name: Karnus

text: Karnus attended the Institute in 727 PCE alongside Daxo au Telemanus and became the Primus of House Jupiter. At some point before leaving to enroll in The Academy, Karnus was a longtime drinking companion of Tharsus and Apollonius au Valii-Rath. Cassius often attempted to tag along on their visits to various Pearl Clubs, but never paid for anything himself. As a result, Karnus confided in Apollonius that he despised Cassius' freeloading.
name: Karnus

text: Julia au Bellona prompted him to enter the Academy to butt heads with Darrow as revenge for Julian's death. After achieving victory with the aid of additional ships provided by Octavia au Lune, he roughs up Darrow in a garden at the Academy's central hub with seven fellow Bellona relatives. He acts as his mother's primary agent of revenge against Darrow, despite having little affection for Julian. He later battles Darrow aboard the Sovereign's ship during the Lion's Rain, where he is able to wound him, but is stabbed through the chest and decapitated by Darrow immediately after.
name: Karnus
